channel.title: Books in the news
channel.description:
No information available.,A quick look at newly published material and books of current interest.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: The Money Game
item.description: In program number 369, Alex Boyd talks about "The Money Game" by the pseudonymous Adam Smith.
